wikipedia_page.main: Claire Louise Calvert (born 1988) is an English ballet dancer and is a first soloist at the Royal Ballet.

response: *Claire Calvert (born 1988) – first soloist at the Royal Ballet
* Claire Calvert (born 1988), ballet dancer, first soloist, Royal Ballet
In March 2021 Campbell announced his engagement to his co-star and first soloist of the Royal Ballet, Claire Calvert.
